instruction: 帮我生成一个 ELMER .sif 文件，核心是用 HeatSolve 方程，过程配 'HeatSolveVec' 和 'HeatSolver'，Solver 1 加个 Reference Norm，材料就一块。
samples:
Header
! Mesh DB "." "mesh"
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory ""
End

Simulation
  Coordinate System = Cartesian 3
  Simulation Type = Steady state
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 1
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = case.ep
End

Solver 1
  Equation = HeatSolve
  Procedure = "HeatSolveVec" "HeatSolver"
  Variable = Temperature
  Variable Dofs = 1
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU1
  Linear System ILUT Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Linear System Abort Not Converged = False
  Linear System Residual Output = 1
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Reference Norm = 1.0
End

Equation 1
  Name = "HeatEquation"
  Active Solvers(1) = 1
End

Material 1
  Name = "Material1"
  Heat Conductivity = 1.0
  Heat Capacity = 1.0
  Density = 1.0
End

Boundary Condition 1
  Target Boundaries(1) = 1
  Name = "TemperatureBoundary"
  Temperature = 300.0
End

instruction: 背景是热分析模拟，需要生成 ELMER 输入文件。请先定义文件的基本结构和常数，然后设置热求解方程与输出过程，最后为求解器配置参考范数并指定单一材料。
samples:
Header
! Mesh DB "." "mesh_directory"
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory "results"
End

Simulation
  Coordinate System = Cartesian 3
  Simulation Type = Steady state
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 1
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = case.ep
End

Constants
  Gravity(4) = 0 -9.81 0 0
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.67e-08
  Gas Constant = 8.314
  Boltzmann Constant = 1.3807e-23
  Unit Charge = 1.602e-19
End

Body 1
  Target Bodies(1) = 1
  Name = "Solid"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 1
End

Equation 1
  Name = "Heat Equation"
  Active Solvers(1) = 1
End

Solver 1
  Equation = Heat Equation
  Procedure = "HeatSolve" "HeatSolver"
  Variable = Temperature
  Variable DOFs = 1
  Linear System Solver = Direct
  Linear System Direct Method = UMFPACK
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-6
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-7
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 20
  Nonlinear System Newton After Iterations = 3
  Nonlinear System Newton After Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Relaxation Factor = 1
  Reference Norm = 1.0
End

Material 1
  Name = "Generic Material"
  Heat Conductivity = 50.0
  Heat Capacity = 500.0
  Density = 7800.0
End

Boundary Condition 1
  Target Boundaries(1) = 1
  Name = "Heat Flux"
  Heat Flux = 0.0
End

instruction: 请编写一个 ELMER .sif 文件，用于弹性分析，包含 Global、Header、Constants、Simulation 和 Body 等部分，使用 StressSolve 和 ResultOutputSolve 过程，设置两个材料块，并在第一个求解器中启用 Reference Norm。
samples:
Header
! Mesh DB "." "mesh"
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory ""
End

Simulation
  Max Output Level = 5
  Coordinate System = Cartesian
  Coordinate Mapping(3) = 1 2 3
  Simulation Type = Steady state
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 1
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = case.ep
End

Constants
  Gravity(4) = 0 -9.81 0 0
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.67e-08
End

Body 1
  Target Bodies(1) = 1
  Name = "MaterialBlock1"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 1
  Body Force = 1
  Initial Condition = 1
End

Body 2
  Target Bodies(1) = 2
  Name = "MaterialBlock2"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 2
  Body Force = 1
  Initial Condition = 1
End

Solver 1
  Equation = "StressSolve"
  Procedure = "StressSolve" "StressSolver"
  Variable = "Displacement"
  Variable DOFs = 3
  Linear System Solver = Direct
  Linear System Direct Method = UMFPACK
  Stabilize = True
  Bubbles = False
  Lumped Mass Matrix = False
  Optimize Bandwidth = True
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-7
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 1
  Nonlinear System Newton After Iterations = 3
  Nonlinear System Newton After Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Relaxation Factor = 1
  Reference Norm = True
End

Solver 2
  Equation = "ResultOutputSolve"
  Procedure = "ResultOutputSolve" "ResultOutputSolver"
  Output File Name = "case"
  Output Format = "vtu"
  Vtu Format = "ascii"
  Scalar Field 1 = "Displacement"
End

Equation 1
  Stress Analysis = True
End

Material 1
  Name = "Material1"
  Youngs Modulus = 210e9
  Poisson Ratio = 0.3
End

Material 2
  Name = "Material2"
  Youngs Modulus = 70e9
  Poisson Ratio = 0.33
End

Body Force 1
  Name = "Gravity"
  Stress Bodyforce 2 = -9.81
End

Initial Condition 1
  Name = "InitialCondition"
  Displacement 1 = 0.0
  Displacement 2 = 0.0
  Displacement 3 = 0.0
End

instruction: 请帮我写个 ELMER 的 .sif 文件，用来做磁动力学相关的计算，要包含方程、求解器和材料这些基本部分，具体参数你看着设。
samples:
Header
  Mesh DB "." "mesh3d"
! Mesh DB "." "mesh"
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory ""
End

Simulation
  Max Output Level = 5
  Coordinate System = Cartesian 3D
  Coordinate Mapping(3) = 1 2 3
  Simulation Type = Steady state
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 1
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = case.ep
End

Constants
  Permittivity of Vacuum = 8.8542e-12
  Boltzmann Constant = 1.3807e-23
  Unit Charge = 1.6022e-19
  Vacuum Permeability = 1.2566e-6
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.6704e-8
  Gas Constant = 8.314
End

Body 1
  Target Bodies(1) = 1
  Name = "MagneticBody"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 1
End

Solver 1
  Equation = "MagnetoDynamics"
  Procedure = "MagnetoDynamics" "MagnetoDynamicsSolver"
  Variable = "Magnetic Vector Potential"
  Variable DOFs = 3
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU1
  Linear System ILUT Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 1
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-7
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-6
  Stabilization Method = Stabilized
End

Equation 1
  Name = "MagnetoDynamicsEquation"
  Active Solvers(1) = 1
End

Material 1
  Name = "MagneticMaterial"
  Relative Permeability = 1000.0
  Electric Conductivity = 5.8e7
End

Boundary Condition 1
  Target Boundaries(1) = 1
  Name = "MagneticBoundary"
  Magnetic Vector Potential 1 = 0.0
  Magnetic Vector Potential 2 = 0.0
  Magnetic Vector Potential 3 = 0.0
End

instruction: 请编写一个可运行的 ELMER .sif 文件，需包含 Global、Header、Simulation、Equation 及多个 Solver 等共 14 个 section。方程需使用 'mgdyn'、'MGDynamicsCalc'、'result output'、'Helmholtz projection' 和 'Remove kernel component'。求解过程需包含 'MagnetoDynamics' 'WhitneyAVSolver'、'MagnetoDynamics' 'MagnetoDynamicsCalcFields'、'ResultOutputSolve' 'ResultOutputSolver'、'SaveData' 'SaveScalars'、'HelmholtzProjection' 'HelmholtzProjector' 和 'HelmholtzProjection' 'RemoveKernelComponent'。同时，在 Solver 4 中设置 Reference Norm 与 Reference Norm Tolerance 参数，并定义一个材料块。
samples:
Header
! Mesh DB "." "mesh"
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory ""
End

Simulation
  Coordinate System = Cartesian 3D
  Coordinate Mapping(3) = 1 2 3
  Simulation Type = Steady state
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 1
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = case.ep
End

Constants
  Permittivity of Vacuum = 8.8542e-12
  Permeability of Vacuum = 1.2566e-6
  Boltzmann Constant = 1.3807e-23
  Unit Charge = 1.6022e-19
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.6704e-8
  Gas Constant = 8.3145
End

Body 1
  Target Bodies(1) = 1
  Name = "Material1"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 1
End

Material 1
  Name = "Material1"
  Relative Permeability = 1.0
  Electric Conductivity = 1.0e7
End

Equation 1
  Name = "MagnetoDynamics"
  Active Solvers(6) = 1 2 3 4 5 6
End

Solver 1
  Equation = "MagnetoDynamics"
  Procedure = "MagnetoDynamics" "WhitneyAVSolver"
  Variable = "Magnetic Vector Potential"
  Variable DOFs = 3
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU1
  Linear System Abort Not Converged = True
  Linear System Residual Output = 1
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
End

Solver 2
  Equation = "MagnetoDynamicsCalc"
  Procedure = "MagnetoDynamics" "MagnetoDynamicsCalcFields"
  Calculate Magnetic Field = True
  Calculate Electric Field = True
  Calculate Current Density = True
End

Solver 3
  Equation = "ResultOutput"
  Procedure = "ResultOutputSolve" "ResultOutputSolver"
  Output File Name = "case"
  Output Format = VTK
  VTK Format = Legacy
End

Solver 4
  Equation = "SaveData"
  Procedure = "SaveData" "SaveScalars"
  Filename = "scalars.dat"
  Reference Norm = 1.0
  Reference Norm Tolerance = 1.0e-6
End

Solver 5
  Equation = "HelmholtzProjection"
  Procedure = "HelmholtzProjection" "HelmholtzProjector"
  Variable = "Magnetic Vector Potential"
  Variable DOFs = 3
End

Solver 6
  Equation = "HelmholtzProjection"
  Procedure = "HelmholtzProjection" "RemoveKernelComponent"
  Variable = "Magnetic Vector Potential"
  Variable DOFs = 3
End

Boundary Condition 1
  Target Boundaries(1) = 1
  Name = "MagneticBoundary"
  Magnetic Vector Potential = 0.0 0.0 0.0
End

instruction: 帮我生成一个 ELMER .sif 文件，核心是配置 Stat Current Solver、MGDynamics 和 Helmholtz projection 这几个方程及其求解过程，还有 Solver 3 和 5 的参考范数扩展项，材料块要设 3 个。
samples:
Header
  Mesh DB "." "mesh_tet"
! Mesh DB "." "mesh"
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory ""
End

Simulation
  Coordinate System = Cartesian 3D
  Simulation Type = Steady state
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 1
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = case.ep
End

Constants
  Gravity(4) = 0 -1 0 9.81
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.67e-08
  Permittivity of Vacuum = 8.8542e-12

instruction: 请编写一个可运行的 ELMER .sif 文件，需包含 Header、Constants、Simulation、Body、Body、Solver 等 17 个 section，并设置求解器方程为 Navier-Stokes、Free 和 Mesh Update，求解过程为 FreeSurfaceSolver，同时为 Solver 3 添加 Reference Norm 扩展项，材料块数量为 1。
samples:
Header
  Mesh DB "." "MESHDIR/Mesh1"
! Mesh DB "." "mesh"
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory "results"
End

Constants
  Gravity(4) = 0 -9.81 0 0
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.67e-08
End

Simulation
  Coordinate System = Cartesian 3
  Simulation Type = Transient
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 2
  Timestep Sizes = 0.1
  Timestep Intervals = 100
  Output Intervals = 10
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = case.ep
End

Body 1
  Name = "Fluid"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 1
  Body Force = 1
  Initial Condition = 1
End

Equation 1
  Name = "Navier-Stokes Equation"
  Navier-Stokes = True
  Active Solvers(3) = 1 2 3
End

Solver 1
  Equation = Navier-Stokes
  Procedure = "FlowSolve" "FlowSolver"
  Variable = Flow Solution[Velocity:3 Pressure:1]
  Exec Solver = Always
  Stabilization Method = Stabilized
  Stabilization Parameter = 1.0
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU1
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 10
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-7
  Nonlinear System Newton After Iterations = 3
  Nonlinear System Newton After Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Relaxation Factor = 0.5
End

Solver 2
  Equation = Free Surface
  Procedure = "FreeSurfaceSolver" "FreeSurfaceSolver"
  Variable = Free Surface
  Exec Solver = Always
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU1
End

Solver 3
  Equation = Mesh Update
  Procedure = "MeshSolve" "MeshSolver"
  Variable = Mesh Update[Displacement:3]
  Exec Solver = Always
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU1
  Reference Norm = 1.0
End

Material 1
  Name = "Water"
  Density = 1000.0
  Viscosity = 0.001
End

Body Force 1
  Name = "Gravity"
  Flow BodyForce 2 = $ -9.81
End

Initial Condition 1
  Name = "Initial Condition"
  Velocity 1 = 0.0
  Velocity 2 = 0.0
  Velocity 3 = 0.0
  Pressure = 0.0
End

Boundary Condition 1
  Target Boundaries = 1
  Name = "Inlet"
  Velocity 1 = 1.0
  Velocity 2 = 0.0
  Velocity 3 = 0.0
End

Boundary Condition 2
  Target Boundaries = 2
  Name = "Outlet"
  Pressure = 0.0
End

Boundary Condition 3
  Target Boundaries = 3
  Name = "Wall"
  No-Slip Wall = True
End

instruction: 我打算用 ELMER 做结构分析，需要生成对应的 .sif 文件。背景是模拟包含两种材料的弹性体。请先设置好文件的基本框架和常数，然后分别配置三维弹性方程和壳方程的求解器与过程，最后确保能保存所需标量数据。
samples:
Header
  Mesh DB "." "shell_and_solid"
! Mesh DB "." "mesh"
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory ""
End

Simulation
  Max Output Level = 5
  Coordinate System = Cartesian 3
  Coordinate Mapping(3) = 1 2 3
  Simulation Type = Steady state
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 1
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = case.ep
End

Constants
  Gravity(4) = 0 -9.81 0 0
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.67e-08
  Permittivity of Vacuum = 8.8542e-12
End

Solver 1
  Equation = "Stress Analysis"
  Procedure = "StressSolve" "StressSolver"
  Variable = "Displacement"
  Variable DOFs = 3
  Linear System Solver = Direct
  Linear System Direct Method = UMFPACK
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Stabilize = True
  Bubbles = False
  Lumped Mass Matrix = False
  Optimize Bandwidth = True
End

Solver 2
  Equation = "Shell"
  Procedure = "ShellSolve" "ShellSolver"
  Variable = "ShellDisplacement"
  Variable DOFs = 3
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = Diagonal
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
End

Equation 1
  Name = "Elasticity"
  Active Solvers(2) = 1 2
End

Material 1
  Name = "Material1"
  Youngs Modulus = 210e9
  Poisson Ratio = 0.3
  Density = 7850
End

Material 2
  Name = "Material2"
  Youngs Modulus = 70e9
  Poisson Ratio = 0.33
  Density = 2700
End

Body 1
  Target Bodies(1) = 1
  Name = "Body1"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 1
End

Body 2
  Target Bodies(1) = 2
  Name = "Body2"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 2
End

Boundary Condition 1
  Target Boundaries(1) = 1
  Name = "FixedSupport"
  Displacement 1 = 0
  Displacement 2 = 0
  Displacement 3 = 0
End

Boundary Condition 2
  Target Boundaries(1) = 2
  Name = "Load"
  Force 1 = 1000
End

! Output
  Scalar Field 1 = Displacement
  Scalar Field 2 = ShellDisplacement
End

instruction: 请编写一个可运行的 ELMER .sif 文件，需包含 Global、Header、Simulation、Body、Material 等部分，设置求解器方程为 MGDynamics、MGDynamicsCalc、ResultOutput 和 SaveScalars，并配置 MagnetoDynamics WhitneyAVSolver、MagnetoDynamicsCalcFields、ResultOutputSolver 和 SaveScalars 求解过程，同时为 Solver 4 添加 Reference Norm 扩展项，材料块数量为 1。
samples:
Header
! Mesh DB "." "mesh"
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory "results"
End

Simulation
  Coordinate System = Cartesian 3
  Coordinate Mapping(3) = 1 2 3
  Simulation Type = Steady state
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 1
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = case.ep
End

Constants
  Gravity(4) = 0 -1 0 9.81
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.67e-08
  Permittivity of Vacuum = 8.8542e-12
  Boltzmann Constant = 1.3807e-23
  Unit Charge = 1.602e-19
  Ideal Gas Constant = 8.314
  Permeability of Vacuum = 1.2566e-06
End

Body 1
  Target Bodies(1) = 1
  Name = "Magnetic Field"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 1
End

Solver 1
  Equation = MagnetoDynamics
  Procedure = "MagnetoDynamics" "WhitneyAVSolver"
  Variable = "Magnetic Vector Potential"
  Variable DOFs = 3
  Linear System Solver = Direct
  Linear System Direct Method = UMFPACK
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 1
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-7
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Nonlinear System Newton After Iterations = 3
  Nonlinear System Newton After Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Relaxation Factor = 1
End

Solver 2
  Equation = MGDynamicsCalc
  Procedure = "MagnetoDynamics" "MagnetoDynamicsCalcFields"
  Calculate Magnetic Field = True
  Calculate Electric Field = True
  Calculate Magnetic Flux = True
  Calculate Current Density = True
  Calculate Joule Heating = True
End

Solver 3
  Equation = ResultOutput
  Procedure = "ResultOutputSolve" "ResultOutputSolver"
  Output File Name = "case.result"
  Output Format = VTK
End

Solver 4
  Equation = SaveScalars
  Procedure = "SaveData" "SaveScalars"
  Filename = "scalars.dat"
  Variable 1 = Magnetic Field Strength
  Variable 2 = Magnetic Flux Density
  Reference Norm = Logical True
End

Equation 1
  Name = "Magnetic Field Equation"
  Active Solvers(4) = 1 2 3 4
End

Material 1
  Name = "Vacuum"
  Relative Permeability = 1.0
  Electric Conductivity = 0.0
End

Boundary Condition 1
  Target Boundaries(1) = 1
  Name = "Magnetic Boundary"
  Magnetic Vector Potential 1 = 0
  Magnetic Vector Potential 2 = 0
  Magnetic Vector Potential 3 = 0
End

instruction: 我需要用 ELMER 进行梁结构分析。请准备输入文件，包含必要的全局设置、求解器（使用 Timoshenko 方程和指定过程，并在第一个求解器中设置参考范数）以及一个材料定义和两个边界条件。
samples:
Header
  Mesh DB "." "spring"
! Mesh DB "." "beam_mesh"
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory ""
End

Simulation
  Coordinate System = Cartesian 2D
  Coordinate Mapping(3) = 1 2 3
  Simulation Type = Steady state
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 1
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = beam_analysis.ep
End

Constants
  Gravity(4) = 0 -9.81 0 0
End

Solver 1
  Equation = "Timoshenko Beam"
  Procedure = "BeamSolver" "BeamSolver"
  Variable = "Displacement"
  Variable Dofs = 3
  Linear System Solver = Direct
  Linear System Direct Method = UMFPACK
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 1
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Nonlinear System Newton After Iterations = 3
  Nonlinear System Newton After Tolerance = 1.0e-6
  Nonlinear System Relaxation Factor = 1
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Reference Norm = 1.0
End

Material 1
  Name = "Steel"
  Youngs Modulus = 210e9
  Poisson Ratio = 0.3
  Density = 7850
End

Boundary Condition 1
  Name = "Fixed Support"
  Target Boundaries(1) = 1
  Displacement 1 = 0
  Displacement 2 = 0
  Displacement 3 = 0
End

Boundary Condition 2
  Name = "Load"
  Target Boundaries(1) = 2
  Force 2 = -1000
End

Equation 1
  Name = "Beam Equation"
  Active Solvers(1) = 1
End

instruction: 请为 ELMER 热分析准备一个 .sif 文件，重点配置求解器和材料结构。
samples:
Header
! Mesh DB "." "mesh"
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory ""
End

Simulation
  Coordinate System = Cartesian 3D
  Simulation Type = Steady state
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 1
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = case.ep
End

Constants
  Gravity(4) = 0 -1 0 9.81
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.67e-08
End

Solver 1
  Equation = Heat Equation
  Procedure = "HeatSolve" "HeatSolver"
  Variable = Temperature
  Variable DOFs = 1
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU1
  Linear System ILUT Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-7
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 20
  Nonlinear System Newton After Iterations = 3
  Nonlinear System Newton After Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Relaxation Factor = 1
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-6
End

Material 1
  Name = "Steel"
  Heat Conductivity = 50.0
  Heat Capacity = 500.0
  Density = 7850.0
End

Body 1
  Target Bodies(1) = 1
  Name = "Body1"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 1
End

Equation 1
  Name = "HeatEquation"
  Active Solvers(1) = 1
End

Boundary Condition 1
  Target Boundaries(1) = 1
  Name = "TemperatureBoundary"
  Temperature = 300.0
End
